text: The Office of the Attorney General of Myanmar (; abbreviated OAG) serves as the Government of Myanmar's main legal advisory body. The Office is led by the Union Attorney General of Myanmar. The incumbent Attorney General is Htun Htun Oo, who was appointed on 5 April 2016. Also, in 2016, lawyers and activists were pressing for the creation of a Ministry of Justice (which has never existed in Myanmar's history) in order for the government to elect a Chief Justice rather than the President. ==See also== *Attorney General of Myanmar *Cabinet of Myanmar *Justice ministry *Politics of Myanmar ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Government ministries of Myanmar Category:Attorneys general Category:1948 establishments in Burma Category:Government agencies established in 1948
title: Office of the Attorney General (Myanmar)
